CS in general is fun but the whole trust factor bullshit doesn't make sense. also your ranking system needs more fixes. how is it i can win 5 games in a row and not rank up and then lose 1 game and my rank drops? also your anti-cheat is pure crap. The amount of hackers even on prime is stupid high. Imagine non prime hackers heaven? there's a reason why people prefer to use third-party matchmaking software. compared to the in game ones. The game itself is fun don't get me wrong. But between the hackers and griefers. It ruins the whole game experience.

My friend convinced me to get into this game back when I only had about 10 to 20 hours in it, and since then I've learned to hate and love this game. I have learned to love the difficulty of the game, no other games challenge me like csgo does, and that's one of the main reasons I keep coming back. Super fun but super toxic sometimes, at the end of the day tho it's a 9/10.
